p: The MIC and MMC of TS Oil against the tested microbes was depicted in Table 3. C. albicans showed greater sensitivity to TS Oil (MIC 75 μg/ml) as compared to gram-positive and gram-negative bacteria. Meanwhile, MRSA (MIC 125 μg/ml) was found more resistant as compared to standard S. aureus (MIC 90 μg/ml) and other tested microbes. Moreover, no difference (p > 0.05) was observed in the activity of TS Oil against clinical and standard strains of K. pneumoniae (MIC 95 μg/ml).
